Description:
Diamond in The Sky...
Located at the rear of an attractive and well maintained block, this beautifully presented renovated 2 bedroom apartment enjoys a spacious floor plan, security entrance and undercover car space on title. Ideal as a first property purchase for the devoted inner city dweller or an astute investment acquisition, this diamond is assured of excellent rental returns and future capital growth.
The apartment offers 2 double bedrooms with robes, large living room, new kitchen with quality appliances, updated bathroom with shower over bath - plus laundry facilities and separate toilet.
An ideal environment for those of us who enjoy Clifton Hill, with extensive parkland, diverse range of specialty shops, delightful eateries and a myriad of public transport options, all at a short distance from your front door...
Insights: 16/41 Fenwick Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2011 and 21 other 2 bedroom unit in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
TOP OF THE HILL
Situated at the top of Clifton Hill, with shops, cafes, restaurants and city train only moments away, make this conveniently located contemporary home an outstanding option. Cleverly designed by architect William Orr, the floor plan has been carefully designed to maximise its prized Northern orientation. The accommodation comprises 2 bedrooms, modern open-plan living segregated by a feature staircase, sundeck to the North, remote control single garage with internal access and 2nd WC / euro-style laundry. This maintenance-free home is sure please those in search of a more relaxed, carefree lifestyle who value location and convenience.
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
Quality & Charm
This proud freestanding Victorian home features a handsome elevated facade and period detailing throughout including original fire place and original Baltic pine flooring. All of these elements easily combine with a quality renovation leaving you to simply relax and enjoy! The warm and bright interior includes two double bedrooms, lounge room (open fireplace), living/dining (wood heater) capturing bright northerly light and opening to an inviting courtyard garden, well equipped kitchen with Smeg appliances, relaxing spa bathroom, Euro laundry, huge attic storage, security alarm and heating/cooling. You will also love the location with hundreds of hectares of bushland just at the end of the street and close to primary schools and public transport.
Peter Bennett : 0419 502 466
Insights: 119 Roseneath Street, CLIFTON HILL VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in CLIFTON HILL have recently been sold.

Description:
DOUBLE STOREY DELIGHT
This substantial 2-storey townhouse located in this very tightly held development is immaculate throughout and surrounded by established native influenced gardens. The home is full of natural light offering a warm, casual ambience with an easy low-maintenance floor plan ideal for relaxed living and effortless entertaining. Brilliantly located in Clifton Hill village near cafes, trains and hectares of parkland including Yarra Bend and bicycle trails. Comprises: 2 double Bedrooms, large bathroom, delightful Living room, Lounge/Dining room adjoining fully-appointed modern Kitchen, and separate laundry with adjoin powder room. Features: Gas ducted heating (ground floor), ample storage space, deep rear garden including large established natives & BBQ area. Delightful!
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
TRANQUIL CITY-EDGE SURPRISE!
With acres of Yarra parklands nearby and sensational private community gardens and poolside area to enjoy, this spacious apartment is sure to make an impression. Free-flowing design incorporates two large bedrooms (both with mirrored BIRs), central bathroom with separate toilet and Euro laundry facilities, open-plan living/dining area and well-appointed kitchen, plus a delightful front terrace and rear courtyard and secure undercover parking space. Ideal for investors and professionals, its prime location sees public transport, Yarra Bend/Dights Falls and riverside trails, shops and cafés all within easy reach.
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Address: 244 Alexandra Parade East CLIFTON HILL VIC 3068
Description:
QUIET LOCALE WITH CITY-EDGE CONVENIENCE!
Tucked away in a secluded pocket with Yarra River trails at street’s end, this stylish semi-detached Federation gem delivers a fabulous Clifton Hill lifestyle. Immediately enjoyable, the home’s spacious interior features two large bedrooms (both with open fireplaces), semi-ensuite central bathroom, contemporary kitchen and open-plan living/dining area, plus concealed laundry facilities, split-system air conditioning, high decorative ceilings and polished timber floors. French doors lead out to a private and surprisingly deep north-facing backyard with under-cover deck, established trees and gate to ROW. Stroll to Yarra Bend parkland and Dights Falls, public transport, Queens Parade shops and cafés.
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
Live, Work, Play or Divide
Continue the conversion from classic to contemporary and create the space you want with this vast freestanding warehouse that features a stunning architect-designed interior only metres from Yarra Bend Park. Immediately enjoy this spacious and stylish light-filled domain including an original front wing of 6 principal rooms plus the renovated north-facing rear section that extends over two levels and offers living and dining zones overlooking internal alfresco terrace, granite gourmet kitchen, office, upstairs bedroom/lounge suite with spabath ensuite, hydronic heating, subfloor cellar, alarm, Spotted Gum floors and two-car auto garaging. A rare opportunity to utilize as is, further improve or develop (STCA) close to shopping, cafes, trains, freeway and the city.
Vincent Taylor : 0417 586 271

Description:
SPACIOUS RESIDENCE, CLOSE TO PARKLANDS
In a highly prized location, this town residence offers an exciting living/working environment and enviable city-fringe lifestyle. Built over two levels featuring three bedrooms with BIRs including upstairs master and separate study area, central bathroom with euro laundry, modern kitchen overlooking stunning open living/dining area, north facing balcony, ideal for outdoor entertaining. Undercover off street parking for 1 vehicle,communal swimming pool and BBQ, area other highlights include heating, air conditioning, secure entrance, excellent storage and high ceilings. Walk to Clifton Hill Station, Quarries Park Merri Creek & Yarra River trails and the vibrant café precincts of Clifton Hill Village and Queens Parade. Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
SITUATED ON 350SQM OF LAND...
Particularly generous proportions, elaborate period detail and a renovation designed to optimise light and space make this freestanding Edwardian (ca 1910) a residence of particular distinction. From the front verandah a leadlight door opens to a wide arched hallway, floored in Baltic pine, from which run three spacious bedrooms. Overlooking the front garden from a box bay window, the main bedroom includes a period-style ensuite bathroom and a dressing room. The second and third bedrooms have large windows to the side courtyard and verandah, and ceiling-height built-in wardrobes. Occupying the full width of the house, the sitting room is beautifully proportioned, with French doors opening to the verandah and folding timber panels separating it from the kitchen and dining area. The kitchen, well-equipped in contemporary style, includes premium appliances and custom-built cabinetry; it overlooks the sunny dining and informal living area which flows out to a timber deck and a paved northerly courtyard. To one side of the dining area is a large family bathroom/laundry. A generous garage with large mezzanine storage space opens from a readily accessible right of way.
A wealth of period detail includes several open fireplaces, fine plaster cornice work and panelling. Featuring evaporative cooling, ducted heating and an alarm system, this welcoming property is located in a quiet cul-de-sac street just metres from parkland, playing fields, Spensley Street Primary School and Walker street kindergarten. Clifton Hill Station, cafes and shops are within easy walking distance. See this and be delighted!
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
FREE-FLOWING LIVING SPACES
Here is a Clifton Hill cottage which is sure to please! The etched glass door from the lace-trimmed verandah opens into a surprisingly large living room with richly polished timber floors and an open fireplace with timber overmantel. A skilful renovation has linked the living room to the expansive dining area at the rear of the house – this flows out through a wall of glass to a larger than normal courtyard garden, with raised garden beds and a paved barbecue area. To one side is the kitchen, well-fitted with Smeg range, integrated dishwasher, and timber-finish cabinetry. Three bedrooms are set to the southern side of the house: all have quality built-in wardrobes, and the bedroom to the rear has a window wall to the garden. A central light court and a neat bathroom/laundry with over-bath shower complete this tranquil property, which features new gas heating, reverse-cycle airconditioning and an alarm system. Queens Parade, Brunswick Street, the Darling Gardens and primary schools are within strolling distance.

Description:
The View of Success
Living directly opposite parkland in Melbourne's inner-city is a dream for most and one that will come true for the astute buyers of this fabulous freestanding post- Edwardian. A view overlooking tranquil Quarries Park is today's reward while things can only get better in the future with this superbly modernized single-fronted home on generous land (272m
approx) promising even more impressive potential to add a second level to take full advantage of the park aspect. Immediately enjoy an easy living interior including two double bedrooms with built-in-robes, attic storage, lounge room with open fireplace, dining area, Smeg/Bosch-equipped stone kitchen with excellent storage, stylish bathroom, laundry, ducted heating, air-conditioning and stunning landscaped courtyard garden ideal for secluded alfresco entertaining. Near city trails, cafes, schools and trains.
Andrew Simondson : 0412 999 128

Description:
YOUNG FAMILIES TAKE NOTE
This beautiful double-fronted Victorian home, with a quality renovation and extension by Nycek Design Architects, is tucked away in a cul-de-sac street. Conveniently located on the city side of Clifton Hill, within walking distance to the CBD and within the catchment zone for Gold Street primary, this home is sure to appeal to young families. Overlooking the lace-trimmed veranda are two spacious bedrooms, both with built-in wardrobes and traditional period detail. The wide central hallway opens to an attractive sitting room with gas-fired open fireplace and contemporary deep box shelving, opposite the good-sized third bedroom, which has access to extensive attic storage. Both of these rooms feature the original Baltic pine linings. Slightly elevated from the front of the house, the hall opens through glass panel double doors to a study (with custom shelving and desk), an elegant bathroom, fitted with full sized bath and walk in shower, and a full-size laundry with separate second WC. Set across the rear of the house is a well proportioned living and dining area with soaring ceilings and a deep bay window seat, and a streamlined contemporary kitchen equipped with stainless steel appliances and pantry. Light streams in from the courtyard garden through multiple sash windows, which look out to the pergola-covered barbecue deck. The garden is watered by a rain water tank, and there is rear access from a right of way. Walk through Darling Gardens to Queens Parade shops and public transport. 3 minute walk to Clifton Hill Primary School.
With its secluded setting and fine combination of period and modern comfort, this is a home and lifestyle with it all, to suit the most discerning buyer.
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
METICULOUSLY RENOVATED, FULL OF LIGHT!
Located in a secluded cul de sac, this welcoming Federation house draws natural light from three sides. With a bullnose verandah, leadlighting and a side entry under a vine-clad pergola, it has immediate street appeal. A hardwood floored lobby leads to two good-sized bedrooms; the main bedroom, overlooking the cottage garden, has a wall of craftsman-built wardrobes. Fitted with handmade mosaic tiles, timber benchtops and an over bath shower, the sunny bathroom includes a laundry. In the centre of the house is the kitchen, complete with pantry; it overlooks a well-proportioned living and dining area, with a tall gabled ceiling, from which timber and glass doors open to a delightful courtyard garden, planted with birch and quince trees. An upstairs extension houses a large high-ceilinged third bedroom/ home office, with expansive views and attic storage. Close to primary schools, Brunswick Street, Queens Parade and three forms of public transport, this imaginatively redesigned property with work-from-home potential includes wall and ceiling insulation, reverse-cycle airconditioning and ceiling fans. Don’t miss it!
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Inner City Lifestyle Investment
Located only seconds from the Clifton Hill train station, Queens Parade shopping strip, local park lands and sporting facilities, this very well appointed two bedroom (or one bedroom plus study) apartment is an attractive investment for the discerning buyer. Open plan living and dining, sheltered balcony, kitchen with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, large laundry and toilet, heating and air conditioning. Description:
WIDE, SPACIOUS AND FULL OF LIGHT
This renovated Victorian terrace with a 7 metre frontage offers unusually spacious rooms, with natural light from three sides. The verandah entry opens to a wide double-arched hallway, with polished timber floors, from which run two large bedrooms, both with open fireplaces and built in wardrobes. The central section of the house consists of expansive living and dining areas, separated by a fireplace wall, fitted with a handsome timber over mantel and gas log fire. Set to the rear are the kitchen (equipped with St George range, tiled splashbacks and timber benchtops), a neat bathroom and separate laundry. French doors open to a paved northerly courtyard (ROW access), which wraps around to the southern side. Opening from the courtyard is a sunny home office. This welcoming property, close to Yarra Parklands, Clifton Hill Village and transport, features extensive attic storage, fine period detail, reverse-cycle airconditioning and an alarm system.
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
BRIGHT, ELEVATED AND WELL LOCATED!
Here is what so many prospective buyers are seeking - a freestanding Edwardian residence located close to parkland, transport, schools and Village cafes. Entry from the front verandah is to a wide Baltic- floored hallway, from which open three good-sized bedrooms, two with built in wardrobes and one with access to a huge ceiling storage space. The hallway opens into a well-proportioned living room with timber overmantel and Jetmaster gas fire. To the rear of the house are a neat bathroom, separate WC and concealed laundry. The dining area is open to a well-equipped timber kitchen - this sun-drenched open-plan space flows out to a large north-facing timber deck, fitted with storage boxes and bordered by plantings of Manchurian pears and dwarf lillipillies. Featuring open fireplaces, attractive plaster detail, ducted heating and reverse-cycle airconditioning, this welcoming property is just a few minutes walk from Dights Falls and Yarra parkland.

Description:
BLUE CHIP LOCATION WITH SO MUCH APPEAL
Semi-detached late Victorian cottage situated at this highly prized Spensley Street address. Including two generous bedrooms with good storage, entry hall with cloak cupboard, "L" shaped open plan living/meals area with beautiful open fire place, mezzanine study and bathroom with cupboard laundry. Situated on a Northerly allotment with a low maintenance courtyard garden. Featuring period detail, this appealing property is right in the very heart of the Clifton Hill Village, with schools, cafes, city transport and Yarra parklands only a short stroll away. You won't be disappointed!
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
EXCELLENT ENTRY POINT
Handsome semi-attached Edwardian terrace combining original period features and modern sophistication to offer a serene indoor/outdoor lifestyle. Located only 4 kms from the CBD, 6 minutes walk to the city train and surrounded by parkland. Benefiting from a generous northerly orientated extension, this property provides a highly prized (and sunbathed) second living area. Featuring a courtyard designed for relaxing - complete with large Merbau day-bed. Other features include: Two generous bedrooms (master with BIR and OFP), large attic storage via stairway, stylish lounge with OFP, sunny modern kitchen, fresh skylit bathroom, concealed laundry, polished Baltic Pine floorboards and NOBO panel heating. Surprisingly affordable for this fantastic suburb, come and be impressed.

Description:
‘HAYSLEMERE’: EDWARDIAN GRACE AND SPACE
This handsome freestanding house has it all – spacious light-filled rooms, period detail, a large allotment (7.62m x 40.23m approx.) with two street frontages, and a prized Village location! A return verandah entry leads to a wide fretwork-trimmed hallway with windows to the bluestone lane at one side. Three ultra-large bedrooms, one with semi-ensuite bathroom, run from the hall, which opens into an expansive living room with access to a side courtyard. The original section of the house features japanned and Baltic pine overmantles, Baltic pine joinery, and intricate plasterwork. A well-planned extension to the rear houses a timber-finished kitchen and pantry, large dining and informal living area, second bathroom with separate WC, and a laundry. Two sets of French doors lead to the paved and treed north-facing courtyard, with car access from Lilly Street. Sound and comfortable now, this impressive property has potential for further renovation in this tranquil corner of Clifton Hill, close to transport, cafes and Yarra Parklands. See it and be impressed!

Description:
LIGHT-FILLED AND WELL-LOCATED!
This freestanding Edwardian residence is bound to appeal. With a fretwork trimmed verandah and other period detail, it occupies an elevated north-facing block in quiet Dally Street, among other quality properties. Offered in sound well-presented condition with abundant natural light to all rooms, it has exciting potential for further renovation and a second storey extension (STCA) to take advantage of the view. Three spacious bedrooms run off a wide hallway, which opens out to a very spacious living and dining area with a partially glazed ceiling and doors to a small courtyard with pedestrian right of way access. A laminate-finish kitchen, featuring the original stove overmantel, overlooks the dining area. Set to one side are a powder room/laundry and a smart spa bathroom. Features include polished Baltic pine floors and ducted heating. The location has everything to recommend it; Clifton Hill Village, schools, transport and Yarra parklands are all within easy walking distance.
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
The Jewel In The Crown
Those who enjoy entertaining or who seek a relaxed and maintenance free life-style will delight in this stunning warehouse apartment, a unique property in this exclusive boutique development.
The open plan living and dining area opens to two outdoor areas and features a seven metre high soaring glass wall flooding the interior with natural light. Add a huge gourmet kitchen with top spec appliances, two bathrooms and potentially three bedrooms, a mezzanine study with views over parklands, upstairs balcony and ample storage - the list goes on. The property also features secure parking for two cars. Public transport, the delights of the Yarra Parklands and all that the area has to offer are in easy walking distance. Inspect now as this property will be snapped up!
Peter Bennett : 0419 502 466
